title: Beef and broccoli stir-fry
directions: Use leftover beef instead of fresh, if you have some to hand
Mix soy sauce, ground ginger, sugar, corn flour and garlic - set to one side
Cut the beef into strips (to save time you can buy stir-fry beef, which is already sliced) and cook in pan on a high heat
Once cooked set to one side
In a new pan (or clean the other one and put the beef in a bowl) heat some oil, add broccoli and cook for 3 minutes
Add beef and cook for 3 minutes
Add soy sauce mixture and cook an additional 3 minutes, stirring all the time
ingredients: Make a tasty beef stir fry for dinner with only a few ingredients. This stir fry recipe is good when you are in a hurry. Simple and tasty!
